item.title: Anyway, I gathered a site where you can learn basic free Pythonmachine learning
item.description: #Introduction I will introduce the sites that I collected by surfing the net with only the name, link and a brief description. (Add links etc. at any time) I would be happy if you could introduce the site in the comments. We do not include famous sites such as Progate and dot installation. We also introduce a blog. Please note that the contents are not explained. Let’s go. #Codeprep Format: Exercise Price: All free Learning scope: Basic grammar, data manipulation, NumPy, Pandas, OOP It is a fill-in-the-blank format and does not require environment construction.

item.title: I thought about how to learn programming for free.
item.description: # Background I thought about a low-cost way to learn programming from an empty situation. (Mac) Is the continuation of. This time, I summarized how to take a smartphone and learn the program for free for those who are new to buying a PC. OPAC-Library search system Perhaps it is OPAC that university graduates know but middle and high school graduates do not. If you are a university, you will be asked at the first orientation of your first year to search for books, magazines, papers, etc.
